price: 除了至仁主援助你们外，还有谁能做你们的援军呢？不归信者们只陷于自欺之中。
arabic: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ جُندٞ لَّكُمۡ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ إِنِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِي غُرُورٍ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: amman hādhā alladhī huwa jundun lakum yanṣurukum min dūni al-raḥmāni ini al-kāfirūna illā fī ghurūrin
